/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. 

On the right side of the street, a row of buildings stands tall, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The buildings, with their traditional Chinese architectural style, add a touch of historical charm to the scene. 

The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, its rays filtering through the leaves of the trees and casting a kaleidoscope of colors on the street below. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, where modernity and tradition coexist harmoniously.
